choices: Okay, so I'm a witch then?
Get out of my house, you crazy bitch!
1.content:
How can my week get any worse? First it was cheerleading tryouts. It was Brianna that convinced me to try out. "Don't worry Penny. You'll do fine". Of course she made it. I did not. I was happy for my friend, but I could not help but see that little green enveous monster. That night, I found my parents standing in the kitchen with my older brother Mike and little brother Jake. Mike is fairly cool, for a 19 year old big brother. I give him points for trying. Jake. That's another story. I swear that little pervert was in my stuff again. Like, what's with him? He was a brat as a kid, and a bigger brat at 13. Anyway, mom and dad told us they were going on a cruise for a year, leaving the next day.

The next few days were a blur. Mike filled in as the 'parent', mostly leaving me and Jake to our own thing. School was getting worse too. Although Bri was nice, life was tough for a failed cheerleader. It was no surprise, I came home crying. As I when up to my room, I saw the door open. "Jake" I muttered furiously. He did everything to annoy me. he read my diary. i swear, I even think he tries on my clothes, not that i've ever caught him. I rushed up to catch in the act, only to stop dead. A woman was sitting on my bed. She had raven red hair, and looked in her mid thirties, styled nicely in a bun. Her clothes were stylish, and make up perfect. I wish mine was. Again I suspect Jake's involvement.

"Who are you and what are you doing in my room?" I demanded.

The woman looked up. "my name is unimportant, Miss Jeffers. But what I'm going to tell you is."

"How do you know my name?"

"Again, unimportant. You're a first witch, Penelope Jeffers."

'What?! Are you okay?" I demanded.

'Perfectly. It is common for a first witch such as yourself. You're the first in your family to be able to use magic."

"I haven't believed in magic.."

"Since you was 10. I know" the woman said
1.title: Prologue to magic

11.content:
"Okay, So I'm a witch then? You already know that I don't believe in magic and you are telling me that I have magic powers. I find that a bit hard to swallow." I told the woman but she just looked and me and then took out her hand and showed me a bright blue flame from her hand.

"You are a first Witch, but you aren't alone I too am a witch as this flame indicates. Feel free to touch it if it satisfies your curiosity." The Woman said. I was amazed and shocked at the flame, thankfully my curiosity was even greater then my shock and much to my amazement as I put my hand in the flame I found it didn't burn, how brightly lit it was, I'd expect to burn, but I felt no pain from her flame at all.

"It doesn't burn...but how?" I asked. The Woman simply smiled and then began to answer my question.

"The Flame Test as we call resembles a flame but is not actually fire at all, it signifies the amount of power a Witch has the brighter the flame the more power she will have, of course naturally through training a witch can increase there power. Why don't you try to summon your flame." The woman then told me.

She gave me a bit of instruction on how to summon it all I had to do was concentrate and imagine a flame appearing in the palm of my hand. I concentrated as hard as I could and much to my surprise I was able to summon a flame however it looked more like a candlelight to me. What really surprised the woman however was the my flame wasn't blue like hers, instead it was....
11.title: Hard to Believe

choices: Find A Witch Mentor to help Me practice
111.content:
My flame was a burning crimson red. Unlike her flame I couldn't understand why my flame was so different from hers. But she was quick on the uptake of what that type of flame meant.

" Interesting a Crimson red flame, is a sign of passion." She told me.

" What does that mean?" I asked her hoping that she would have the answer towards my flames color.

" It means that you will do well with enchanting items and spells that deal with emotion. However there are certain thing you would be less skilled at. Especially if they don't interest you." She explained to me.

" Alright so now that we figured that out, what am I supposed to do from here?" I ask her once more unsure of what to do at the moment. The woman simply smiles and then begins to head out the window and leave just as she had entered.

" I Left you a book of spells, If you wish to learn more however you do have options. In the book there are directions for a school for beginner witches, or you could find another witch to study under. You are a first witch after all and most people like that usually study it themselves first. Either way Penny it will be your choice." The woman said and then left as quick as she had appeared.

After hearing the options she gave I decided to....
111.title: Flames of Passion

1112.content:
After hearing the options she gave I decided to find another Witch to mentor me an help me learn about these abilities of mine. Too bad I didn't know of any witches other than the one that just jumped out of the window. I then looked at the book that witch left for me and began to read it. I would hope there would be something in the book to help me.

The first few pages of the magic book contained no signs of an spells instead just a lot of reading about the rules that a witch must follow. The rules were simple. The first one was that witches were not allowed to use magic in public without a good reason. The Second rule was that all witches would be tested in one way or another. The Third however was that no transformation may be permanent unless under life threatening situations. After reading that one I hoped to avoid being in life threatening situations. The Fourth rule stated that a New Witch will be evaluated by the Head Witch after one year of training.

" Wonder why a new witch must be evaluated after a year of training?" I asked aloud without even thinking. Much to my surprise however the book had seemed to answer back as if to respond to my question.

" Every New Witch is evaluated to ensure the know all the basics and guidelines as well as to determine how well they do against various scenarios that could end up causing a lot of these New witches to go Rogue." The Book responded. The book responding to my question however gave me an idea. While I did not know where a could find a witch that could tutor me the book probably did. With that thought in mind I decided to ask the book.

" Okay book, I am a new with and I am seeking the best mentor for me? Can you find one?" I asked.

The book glowed and revealed an address almost as if the book knew exactly where it wanted me to go. I decided to go and head out to the place where the book told me. I took the book with me and left a note for my two brothers that I had left home and will be back shortly. I walked until I came upon a rather old house. I then went and knocked on the door. A woman came up to the door and greeted me. She had brown hair and blue eyes. Her look was rather ragged and worn as if she had literally been working all kinds of hours and I just caught her while she was sleeping.

" Hello? Who might you be?" The woman asked.

" My name is Penny Jeffers? I am curious about you a bit because a book lead me to you. I believe it said you could help me as well." I told her.

" You mean a phone book?" The woman asked. I quickly shook my head.

" No, not that kind of book. The Other kind of book." I told her. She then looked around and once she was sure no one was around she gestured for me to come inside. I nodded and then went inside her house, once I was in her house she began to introduce herself.

" My name is Annabelle Springs, I am what some would call a Witch Detective now what brings a novice witch to my place?" She asked. She was right on the point and even pointed out that she already knew that I was a witch. Without a doubt I was sure I would be able to learn something from her. However somehow I also knew she wasn't the person who gave me the book in the first place.

" I came to learn from you. I asked the magic book and brought me to you. Can I ask you something what exactly is a Witch Detective?" I asked.

" So you came to learn magic from me then, Alright I'll teach you but in exchange you will have to do some favors for me. As for what a Witch Detective is. Well that depends on who you ask. To some I am just an ordinary detective trying to make a living. To Others I am a Witch. However I am both in certain circumstances." Annabelle told me.

" Thanks for helping me, Guess we will start with lessons tomorrow then?" I asked.

" I will actually give you an actual one right now, Although it may not be what you think. What is Magic to a Witch? That is your homework for our first meeting. Tomorrow we will begin with Basic Witch Training, Flexibility Training and Meditation. I trust you will leave at least three hours each day I will give you one day of your choice to rest each week. As for the things you will do let's just say there's a lot of stuff around the house that needs to be done." Annabelle said. After meeting and hearing her give me homework before I even done any training under her. Three hours a day seemed a lot however knowing that I failed to be picked for a cheerleader gave me plenty of time. Of Course I didn't understand why she wanted me to go through the flexibility training as well as the meditation at this point.
1112.title: Enter: The Witch Detective

choices: " You will find out soon enough."
11121.content:
The Next day luckily happened to be the weekend so I had plenty of time to think about her little homework problem. " What is magic to a Witch?" She asked me. I didn't quite understand what she was trying to tell with this particular question. At least not yet I couldn't answer it, because even though I am technically a Witch, I never really thought of myself as one. It was at this point I had found my answer at least. Unfortunately I didn't even know if it would be the right one.

I knocked on her door once again and she was quick to answer. " I see you came back, Have you found the answer to your Homework?" She asked me.

" I never considered myself a Witch before, So I don't think I can give you an answer." I told her.

" You just did, it is a question I asked of you, but I am rather proud that you found your answer." She told me.

" But Didn't I just tell you I never considered myself a Witch? So how can that be an answer?" I asked.

" Most Witches now a days usually focus a whole lot on gender spells, whenever I asked them the same question they always were excited about that prospect of magic. But often forget about the other magic and hardly ever work at anything else. My training how ever doesn't focus on that. " Annabelle replied.

" So what does your training focus on then?" I asked. It was then she quickly replied....
11121.title: First Day of Training

choices: My Brother Angrily Waiting at the Front Door
Mike Curious about Where I had Gone
111212.content:
"You will find out soon enough. I assure you. It is rather refreshing to teach a young witch who isn't overly interested in turning their sibling into girls. Although I am pretty sure, with more practice you are bound to be doing that at some point."

I looked at her a bit confused but glad that she had took a rather peculiar liking to me. Despite her liking aside form her being both a detective and a Witch I was eager to learn more about her. So without further delay I decided to simply ask her.

"Miss Springs, can you tell me a bit about yourself?" I asked. She looked at me and smiled back as she quickly began to answer.

"Sure, what is that you wish to know about me?" I thought long and hard there were so many things I wanted to know about her, who her parents were, how she learned she was a witch and a whole lot more. I thought about all the things I would like to know about her, I decided to ask the one thing I was the more curious about than anything else.

" How did you become a Witch Detective Miss Springs?" I asked. She looked at me and gave a slight smile, yet it wasn't a reassuring smile or a comforting one, in fact it looked like asking that particular question reminded her of some fond yet rather remorseful memories.

" That is a good question, I don't want to get too big on the details and take much of your time. So I will keep it short." She then looked at me and continued with her story. " I was once a Rogue Hunter a Witch that hunts Rogue witches, I had me reasons for doing such a demanding job, but back then I believed the Rogue Hunters were the symbols of Justice in the witch world. I was rather naïve for thinking that. At that time I simply never thought the Rogue Hunters could do anything that would be more beneficial to them. I always believed them to be fair and just. However that changed one day when I caught one of my partners implanting evidence onto the suspect!"

" You had a partner and they planted evidence on the person you and them were trying to catch? Was the Witch really someone they needed to do that with?" I asked curious about Miss Springs story.

" No they didn't have to, she was actually innocent, but they wanted to make her guilty of the crime anyway. I couldn't stand to see them do that so I went to my Supervising Officer and told her about it. I thought she would call my partner out on that. However I was shocked to learn that my Supervising Officer was the one who told my partner to do so!" As I was listening to her story I found it to be quite interesting. Although she had yet to get to the part of how she became a Witch Detective.

" What happened after that?" I asked.

" After that I had to go to the Head Witch and talk to her about what my Supervisor and Partner were doing. Neither of them wanted me to do that, but I don't believe people should be punished if they haven't done anything wrong. Fortunately the Head Witch agreed to me. She was kind of still new to being the Head witch back then, but eventually with her help I was able to prove that my partner and Supervisor were implanting evidence on to this witch. Once that was proven all charges upon the witch they were framing were dropped and my supervisor and partner were fired. I could have continued on with the Rogue Hunters, however after that experience I didn't really feel like continuing down that path so I went back to school and learned to be a detective. I don't want any one witch or non witch to face any type of injustice like that ever again." After that point I could tell that there was more to the story than what she had told me. She didn't seem like she wanted to speak about it anymore though. Fortunately I then decided to ask a somewhat easier question, rather than press on.

" Do you know anything about the witch your partners were trying to frame?" I asked.

" Not much, only that her name was Samantha. Other then that I don't know much about her. How about we get on with today's magic lesson now?" She replied.

" Fair enough, what is it you want me to do this time?" I asked.

" This time will be quite different from your previous one. First I want you to summon your flame." Annabelle Springs told me. Without further delay I began to summon forth my crimson red flame.

" Now what am I supposed to do?" I asked.

" This training will be a lot more tricky then the first lesson, but all the worthwhile now that you summoned it I want you to change it's color, like this." Miss Springs then went and brought fourth her own blue flame and then changed it so that it matched the color of my flame. With her story however at the time I was rather disappointed that this was the next step she would have me take.

" What is the point of doing that?" I asked.

" Simple, you already know that a different color flame can bring different abilities or in your case enchantments you could use. By learning to change your flames color you will be able to master a variety of spells. You will never know when a spell your unfamiliar with will come in handy. I expect it should take you about seven days to learn to change it into seven different colors." She replied.

The rest of the day I spent training trying to change the color of my flame, but so far I wasn't able to do it today. It was then I remembered that it was my turn to make dinner for my brothers Jake and Mike. I had been so focused on my magic that I practically forgot, it didn't exactly help that I was late either. I waved and said my goodbyes to my teacher and quickly headed home. As I got home I found...
111212.title: The Detectives Story

" Jake, enough fooling around, give Jess her clothes back and get dressed in your own room." Mike said. Once he did Jake finally stopped goofing off and did as he said. I still had no clue as to why he even tried my clothes on to begin with but I was tired of dealing with it. I was going to do something about it to be sure but what?

113.content:
A pure white flame, I was amazed at it and it seemed the mysterious woman was as well. "How Interesting...I've
heard of people having different color flames before, but this is the first time I've actually witnessed it myself." The woman said.

"I managed to summon, but it doesn't look like yours why is that?" I asked eagerly awaiting the mysterious woman's answer.

She looked and examined the flame for five minutes, after that she got out a strange book and looked into it. She scanned the pages for at least two minutes before she finally found her answer. "Ah! So that's what it means...Well I should prepare appropriately then." She then turned to me and finally responded to my question.

" Dear Girl, sometime people have different color flames, it doesn't signify the amount of power you have, rather it signifies your magic specialty." She said.

I was a bit confused at her answer but from what I could guess from her actions, this was most likely her first time encountering a different type of flame. "What do you mean magic specialty?" I asked.

"To put it simply your gifted in divine magic, which is unusual but not unheard of." She then continued. "Divine Magic to put it simply is things like finding lost item's, healing, and dealing with evil spirits, which means you will need training eventually but for now I will leave you with a basic Spell Book, study it carefully and be warned your power is rare others will seek it for themselves."

She then instructed me on how to turn off the flame in my hand and gave me a Spell Book, then she simply vanished as if she had never been in my room at all, with the exception of the spell book. I decided that now I would finally try one of the spells in the Spell Book. The First spell was simply something that had to do with putting on my make-up. I could try that spell it seemed easy enough, or I could try the second spell which was a simple levitation spell. Both of those spells seemed interesting I wonder if I should try one of those or perhaps find a spell to use on someone else?

11311.content:
...Only made my clothes invisible rather than me completely. I was rather worn out after trying that type of spell. It seemed that Invisibility took quite a bit out of me as I felt exhausted from just using it once. What was worse was now I looked completely naked! Worst yet my brother was coming down the hall this way. It was my brother Jake who came out of the shower and worst yet he saw me!

" Yours could be a bit bigger." Jake said to me with a grin. It was almost as if he was glad he got a sneak peak of my body. I was infuriated! I tried a spell and it didn't work like it expected. Not only that but that invisibility spell was exhausting. As I thought about it further and further, I had magic powers now, but I had no clue on how to use them or prevent embarrassing incidents like this. I decided to continue to go to take my shower and read up on the magic book a bit further before using any other spells. I was too tired to cast a single one anyways.

When I read the magic book further I find I wasn't reading spell's but rather rules. Apparently there were a lot of rules, some of which stated that I can't transform anyone permanently unless their life is threatened. This confused me as how would other people's life be threatened? I quickly remember the woman who was in my room and realized that perhaps not all Witches would have good intentions. That brought me to conclude that there are other witches out there. Probably some even more experienced than me. It also occurred to me that the woman who told me I was a witch never did give her name. For the moment I just slept on it and waited until morning.

The Next morning came and unfortunately it was another school day, however I felt much better after a nights rest. I held off on try casting the spells but decided to take the book with me. Hopefully today would be a better school day than yesterday, knowing my luck I doubt that's the case.
11311.title: Invisibility isn't Easy

choices: I turned Joe into a Little girl
I cast the Karma spell on Joe
Before I could Cast the spell!  The Principal stops me!
113111.content:
The day started out fine at the beginning even better than yesterday ended, but just because a day starts out good doesn't mean that the way it would end. My first period I had Geometry with Brianna there as well. Thankfully she was there because I don't think there is anything more boring than geometry first thing in the morning. my second period was World History I would have loved to have Brianna hear for this class as well unfortunately that wasn't the case as we had different second periods and third periods. Thankfully we had the same lunch period.

Unfortunately the one I had shared my second period with was the school bully Joe, he was about five foot and nine inches tall, had short brown hair and green eye's. His body wasn't too overly muscular or too thin, it was about average. For some reason however he seemed to enjoy picking on me. or at least that's what I thought especially since this is where my torment began today.

" Well if it isn't the Cheer Failure! Can't believe someone can actually fail at cheerleading. Perhaps you'll set a new record of the most failed to try out by the end of the year. " Joe said with a smirk on his face. It was that smirk that really ticked me off. He didn't have any right to do that to me! If it wasn't for the head cheerleader being a bossy prick who knows, I might of actually made the squad.

" You already failed several times before, as you've never tried out before." I said to counter Joe's remark about yesterday's failure. Somehow I think he expected me to come and cry and beg in to his arms. However he's yet to learn that I am not that kind of girl. I was really tempted to use my spell book on him, but for now I restrained myself. Thankfully the class ended and we were both on our way to our respective third periods.

Biology was rather quiet and I was thankful that we didn't have to dissect anything. I didn't want to take a look inside the insides of an earthworm or a frog or any other animal for that matter. Unfortunately I was required to attend biology despite my not liking certain aspects of it. Fortunately third period was over before I knew it and then it was time for lunch or fourth period for some.

I went and sat at the same table my friend Brianna sat out and we began to talk.

" I can't believe Joe said that! Making fun of me just because I failed tryouts it's not like I'm the only one who failed. And how can you stand being on the same team as that prick Brianna?" I asked while complaining about stuff she wasn't yet aware of.

" She's not as bad as you think Penny, and as for Joe I think he may have a crush on you." Brianna said.

" He's picking on me Brianna he can't possibly have a crush!" I exclaimed to her.

" You never know, he might just be thinking about asking you out one of these days." Brianna said. I shuttered at the mere thought of me going out with that brutish person. It was at this point where Brianna saw that I had an extra book in my backpack.

" What is that other book for? " Brianna asked. I went and looked at her, where she was pointing was at my magic book. I had almost forgotten about it then. If she hadn't pointed out I might of not of made the mistake that made my day much worse.

" I'll tell you about it later, right now I kind of can't. Let's just say if I told you, there is no doubt in my mind that you wouldn't believe me." I told her. She was satisfied with that answer but with the lunch hour almost over we began to clean up our plates and head back to class. It was then that I saw Joe again this time he was picking on some kid named Tim. I had no idea what there deal was but I was tired of seeing people be picked on. So I decided I would teach him a lesson. I carefully got out my spell book and looked for a spell that would be good. I found two one was a spell that would turn Joe into a little girl that would surely teach him a lesson. The second spell I could use was some kind of Karma spell? I didn't really get it at that time. But either way Joe would get what he deserved for picking on that kid.
113111.title: A Bullies Crush?

A teacher who knew about magic. I was very delighted at the sight of my spell working even if it did scare some kid named Tim a little bit. I didn't think that would have any consequences after all. I did help him even though I had no idea what frightened him so much. It was then that the once bully Joe began to pull upon my clothing and began demanding.

" Change me back now!" He demanded as he puffed and I couldn't help but to think how cute he looked as a girl.

" Why? You look so cute and adorable like this, Josephine." I teased him. He however was not amused by my teasing him.

" I am a guy! Not a girl! I demand you change me back!" He said he was looking angrier at the moment. I look at him and replied to him firmly despite his demands.

" No I am not going to change you back! You keep picking on people so perhaps it's time you learn what it's like to be picked on!" I told him. It was then a teacher's hand had grabbed just as I was about to leave the situation as it is. As soon as I caught glance of it I knew who she was it was Mrs. Snow a teacher who many of the students in class referring to as one of the coldest, and toughest teachers in the school.

" Where do you think you are going Mrs. Jeffers No magic is allowed on school property!" Mrs. Snow told me. Her words were a bit surprising to me, Mrs. Snow knew about magic and also explained a rule to me t hat even I didn't know about. Which got me to wonder who was she really? The only thing the students knew about her was that she was very strict and usually harsh upon every punishment she gives. Some would even say she just liked giving out punishments.

" How do you even know about magic Mrs. Snow?" I asked a bit curious of how she knew.

" This isn't about me, it's about your mess. Now how about you clean up by changing him back! You have no idea of the consequences of your actions!" Mrs. Snow told me evading the question. Her telling me to change him back made me realize that all thought I had change from a boy to girl I really had no idea how to undo my spell!

" How do I change him back?" I asked. Mrs. Snow stared at me with an icy glare like she expected me to know that.

" Of all the irresponsible things, you cast a spell without even knowing the consequences. Then I am going to have to call your parents or magic teacher about this." Mrs. Snow replied.

" That's not going to work my parents don't know anything about magic and our away for who knows how long, and as far as magic teacher I don't actually have one." I told Mrs. Snow. She was infuriated by my words but yet also now understood why I had made so many mistakes.

" Then who gave you your book then?" Mrs. Snow asked.

" A woman just appeared and told me I had magic abilities I believed her and then she ran off." I told her. However the look on Mrs. Snow's face from that point looked like she had known who the woman who gave me the book was, yet she was still infuriated.

" That complicates things a little, but I do know how to resolve that little issue. One you go to a school dedicated to training you in your magic. Or you get training from me." Mrs. Snow said. Just as she said that she removed your spell that turned the bully into a little girl and he was finally back to his former self. Mrs. Snow not only removed the spell but also removed his memory of all the events that lead up to the spell. Yet oddly enough you noticed that like yourself Mrs. Snow also had a white flame or at least that's what I thought.

" I wont punish you for your ignorance this time, but know that if you do cast any spells on school property again. I wont be as lenient. For now I suggest you at least try to get someone more knowledgeable than you in magic, so you don't look like an idiot again." Mrs. Snow said before finally letting go of my arm. Surprisingly Mrs. Snow was more fair in her judgment and punishments than I thought she was. At least from what I heard, knowing she also had magic too was quite a surprise, I decided to think about Mrs. Snow's offer and the option she had given to me. I wasn't sure which one I would pick, I thought about it and eventually chose too...
11311113.title: School has a No magic rule?!

1132.content:
The levitation spell it was a simple spell that could cast upon any object or person and it would allow that object to levitate. Provided that I keep up my concentrated I looked around for the objects I could levitate around my room and begin simple with just a basic pencil. the flame came and ignited in my hand as I cast the spell I saw the pencil rose up in the air much to my amusement. I was glad that the spell worked the first time, So I decided to try it out on a few more objects.

The next object I used was on my bed which was a bit more harder to keep in the air, possibly due to it being rather large but even my bed I was able to levitate though not as much as I could the pencil. It was then I had a very mischievous idea. Rather than continue to levitate these objects perhaps I should choose a person to levitate instead. Fortunately I had my brothers I could use this new found spell on, or I could try it myself. Fortunately through the quick process of thinking what would be most fun I decided to use the spell on...
1132.title: Levitation Spell

13.content:
"O...kay" I said, drawing out the words. I thought this woman was crazy, and it showed. "Prove that 'magic' is real. And no stupid card tricks"

"I get that alot, Penny. Pick a target."

'Target?" i said, still wondering how she knew my name.

"Yes, target' the woman sighed. "I could just show you a flame, but you would just dismiss it."

I looked at her. My life was pretty much wrecked anyway. All I had left was my pride. "Fine. my 'target' is..."
13.title: O...kay. Prove it

choices: I took care of that part.
131.content:
"My little brother Jake." I replied, hesitantly. "He's always going through my clothing, I have a creepy feeling he likes the feeling of feminine clothing."

The woman giggled. "It's only because he is the closest to you." she said. "It will take too long to explain but, basically, he wants to be like you." she grinned. "He is about to get his wish granted."

With that, she waved her hand and I heard a girlish scream outside my door. Moving quickly, I opened the door to see a thirteen year old girl in Jake's clothing, staring at me in complete horror. "Wha- What happened!?" she screamed. "How did I get to be a girl!?"

Thinking quickly, I pulled girl Jake into my room and turned to the woman who giggled. "You make a real cute girl, Jake." she said, teasing. "Now, at least, those clothes you 'borrowed' will fit you better."

Jake pouted, tears flowing from her eyes. "They didn't fit her anymore, anyway." he cried. "My clothes just felt wrong, that's all, Penny's old clothing felt better."

"We'll talk about this later." I hissed, looking at him. I turned to the woman. "Okay, you made your point, I believe you."

The woman smiled sweetly. "Good girl." she said. "Now then, you must learn to control those of yours." she summoned a book and gave it to me. "Follow the lessons exactly and you'll do fine."

"Wait, what about Jake?" I asked, pointing to my new sobbing sister. "Won't you change her back to normal?"

The woman smiled, giggling. "I need an assurance that you will study the book." she replied. "If you follow the lessons and study the book seriously, you'll learn how to change your brother back in about two weeks."

"Two weeks!?" Jake and I asked in unison.

"What about Mike?" I asked. "He's sure to know something is wrong when he sees he has two sisters now!"

The woman laughed and said...
131.title: Jake

1311.content:
"What?" I asked, hearing the woman's reply.

"Mike will believe that 'Jessica' had always been a girl." said the woman smiling. "In the mean time, you can teach your new sister why girls need their privacy."

I was stunned, hearing that and turned slightly red. "I didn't chose Jake to get some revenge!" I protested. "I just wanted to know what was up with him!"

"Oh my." said the woman, clearly surprised. "I thought for certain that..." she shrugged. "Well, with some practice, you can change her back to normal and the reality spell will reverse itself. In the meantime, think of this as a bonding experience."

With that, she vanished without a sound. I sighed, frustrated, then turned to my new sister. "Looks like you're going to be a girl for a while... sis." I said, wincing. "Apparently that woman wants me to learn magic and, making you a girl was her guarantee that I would." pausing, I asked, "What was that about my clothes being more comfortable?"

Jessica winced. "For over a month now, my clothes have been feeling too rough." she said. "They were rubbing my skin raw, making it hurt to wear them." she gulped. "I guess I was desperate when I found an old pair of your panties in the laundry because I tried them on. They didn't hurt my skin so I started wearing them."

"So you were going through my stuff to find clothes that would fit you?" I asked, concerned and disturbed.

Jessica nodded, looking embarrassed. "For some reason, your clothes don't hurt me." she replied. "I've been going through your room to try to find out why. I tried your body wash, your hair conditioners... " she winced. "I even tried your makeup and perfume. So far, nothing seems to make my own clothes feel right."

"Well, that's odd." I said, intrigued. "Why didn't you just say something to Mike or me?"

Jessica shed a tear. "Would you have believed me if I just told you that my my clothes suddenly hurt me but yours feel just right against my skin?" she asked.

I sighed. "Point taken." I said.

"What are we going to do, sis?" asked Jessica.

"We'll figure something out." I said. "But first...."
1311.title: A family changed.

13111.content:
"We'll figure something out." I said. "But first, you need a new look as you'll probably be a girl for a long while."

Jessica moaned. "At least I'll look better in the girls' clothing." she said.

Then a thought crossed her mind and she ran to her room with me following. What we found made Jessica look ill and me trapped between laughing at her or feeling sorry. Jessica's room was now suited for a teenage girl with pink walls, a canopy bed, white dresser, and white vanity. Jessica ran to her closet and opened it to find all of her clothing had been changed into fashionable girls' clothing. "Well, at least we don't have to take you shopping." I said with a half smile.

"What am I going to do?" wailed Jessica, frustrated. "I don't know how to act like a girl."

"This is going to be a long weekend." I thought. "Come on, Jess." I said. "Let's get you fixed up then talk about what you need to know as a girl."

Reluctantly, Jessica took my hand and I led her back into my room where I sat her down in front of my vanity. "Just relax and I will help make you beautiful." I said.
13111.title: A new look for Jessica.

131111.content:
"Okay, the idea behind makeup is accent your features." I explained, picking up a foundation brush. "Fortunately, your skin tone is very close to my own so this part will be easy."

Jessica sighed. "Just get it over with." she said.

I smiled and placed the foundation brush into her hand. "Brush it on lightly and evenly so to make it look natural." I told her. "We need to start with your skin being all one color."

"Huh? You want me to do it?" asked Jess, surprised.

I giggled. "There's not enough time in the morning for me to get you and myself ready." I replied. "You need to learn how to do this yourself." smiling, I added, "At least you'll be able to pick your own style."

Jess looked at the brush then at the mirror then sighed as she began to brush the foundation on. "Do I just wipe it on or do it in swirls?" she asked.

"Just lightly dab it on then brush it it with careful swirls." I said, watching my new sister. "That's it, careful not to make it too heavy or it'll look sloppy."

Once Jess had her foundation on, I took up a set of blush colors and showed them to her. "Which color do you think is more you, sis?" I asked her.

Jess looked at the colors and pointed to a light red color. "That one?" she said, guessing.

I smiled. "Good choice." then I remembered her saying that she had tried on my makeup and giggled. "I guess you really have been practicing."

Jess blushed, letting out a moan. "It was research." she said, defensively. "I was trying to see..."

"Easy, I'm only teasing you." I said, interrupting her. "I promise I will study hard so to change you back but it will take a while, I don't want to rush this and make matters worse."

Jess sighed, looking as if she wanted to scream but reluctantly nodded as she took the brush from me and applied her blush, though not exactly the right way. "No, no, on the cheek bones, not under them." I corrected, gently guiding her hand. "Just like the foundation, light and even."

After several minutes of teaching Jess how to apply makeup, I turned her to the mirror. "Say hello to the new you, Jess." I said. "What do you think?"

Jess looked at the mirror, surprised by how she looked. "I'm beautiful." she whispered. "Is this what I would look like if I were born a girl?"

"I'm not sure." I replied. "Maybe."

Then Jess winced slightly. "What will I do when... it happens?" she asked.

I sighed, knowing what she was talking about. "I'll lend you some of my pads and teach you how to use them." I replied, touching her shoulder. "I know you're scared, I am too." I smiled. "We'll work this out, okay?"

Just then, a knock came to your bedroom door. It was...
131111.title: Girl lessons begin.

1311111.content:
"I'm back from the store." said Mike's voice. "Is it safe for me to come in?"

"We're decent, Mike." I called back. "Come on in."

The door opened and Mike walked in with a bag in hand to see Jess wearing makeup and me brushing out her hair. A kind smile formed across his face. "It looks like my little tomboy sister is becoming a woman." he said, reaching into the bag. "They were almost out I got that perfume you wanted, Penny."

"Thanks, Mike." I said, taking the perfume bottle. "Want to try some?"

Mike chuckled. "It's not my brand." he replied, smiling. "I also got Jess a bottle, in case she wanted to try it."

"Th-Thank you." said Jess, blushing.

She took the bottle and sniffed it before giving me a questioning look. I giggled. "It's not that bad, is it?" I asked.

"Well, no." replied Jess, blushing more. "It's just that, I'm new to all this 'girly' stuff and..."

Mike laughed. "You're afraid that boys will notice you more." he said, guessing. "Don't worry, if any guy tries something inappropriate, I'll kick him into next week."

"If I don't get to him first." I added. "You're going to be okay, sis."

Jess managed a weak smile. "Thanks, guys." she said.

Mike nodded then left the room as I went back to brushing out Jessica's hair. "Do you feel like going out after this?" I asked her. "You'll need to be at ease, walking out in the open if you're going back to school like this."

Jess moaned. "They have a uniform policy." she said, despairingly. "I'm not sure I'm ready for short skirts."

I sighed the took out the school uniform. "No time like the present to get used to it." I said.
1311111.title: Mike.

13111111.content:
"Get dressed, I'll change into the uniform too." I said, handing her the skirt and blouse. "We can go visit my friends down the street and go to the new malt shop."

Jess gulped. "I- I don't know." she said, worried. "I don't know anything about being a girl. They'll see me as a big tomboy and try me all girlie."

"It's going to happen, sis." I told Jess. "Either here or at school until I can find a way to reverse the spell." wincing, I added, "Since reality was changed as well, there may be several spells involved in your change, I just don't know."

Jess sighed, hanging her head in defeat. "Fine. she said. "Just don't let them try to hook me up."

I giggled at the thought then winced as I saw Jess staring to cry. "I promise I'll study the magic book carefully and change you back as soon as I can." I said, hugging her. "For now, just try to be my sister... please."

"I- I'll try." said Jess.

After changing clothes and telling Mike we were going to meet some friends down the street, we left the house together with Jess looking very uncomfortable. "Try to relax, Jess." I said, seeing her. "My friends aren't going to bite you."

We reached the door of my best friend Erin Jones and rang the doorbell. A short brown haired girl with blue eyes answered and smiled. "We were just about to call you two." she said. "We're gathering for a slumber party, it'll be fun!" she then eyed me and giggled. "Jess is still nervous about wearing short skirts, I see."

I giggled back. "Yeah, she's such a tomboy." i said, smiling. "I'm slowly getting her to come out of her shell."

"Well a small makeover is a good start." she said, eying Jess, smiling. "Maybe we can take it a step further tonight." she then turned into the house. "Girls, Jess is here!"

Before either of us could react, several hands grabbed us both and yanked Jess into the house before Erin allowed me to enter and closed the door...
13111111.title: going out.

choices: Mike trips as he goes upstairs, opening the book
131111112.content:
Alone at last Mike grinned, as he grabbed the steak he just cooked and began eating. He was drained from being the 'adult', and wanted to enjoy himself. Halfway through, he saw a book on the table -my magic book, which I took out of my room. Jess had wanted my to take it, and try to discretely find a reversal. She begged me to take it, so I pretended to to place it in my bag. In reality, I left it on the table with my homework, thinking Mike would not notice. I was wrong.

Mike saw the magic book and immediately realized it wasn't homework. "Why did she bring her diary out here? She is such a ditz sometimes" he said to himself as he picked up the book. Although he (wisely) had no intent to read it, he though i would appreciate it if he took it into my room, and out of the open. As soon as he touched it, he felt strange, somehow, and immediately knew it was not my diary. 'This is not her diary. What is this thing? Why do I feel weird touching it? Its like its got some sort of power...." He stared at the book for several minutes, before shrugging his shoulders. Books don't have some sort of weird power. Penny will tell me what this thing is Mike thought, having made his decision not to investigate right now, and risk me yelling at him for 'going through my stuff'.
131111112.title: Mike finds the magic book.

choices: the full moom will be up in less than an hour. This should be interesting.
I suggest you don't get wet
1311111122.content:
Mike opened my door, intending to pack the book on my bed, but he got a massive shock, since a cloaked woman was standing in my room. It was the witch, not that he knew that.
"Who are you, and what are you doing in my sister's room. Get out!"

"My name is not important" the witch said. "And I'm shocked that Penny isn't here."

"Who are you, and how do you know my sister?"

"Again, not important. As for your sister, we met a couple of hours ago. Where is she? I thought she would be studying right now...."

Mike looked at the woman, wondering if I met some psycho earlier. "My sisters are out. For the last time, who are you?"

"Mike Jeffers, I will not tell you my name, but I will tell you what i am. i am an extremely powerful witch that just informed your sister she is also in possession of magical powers. "

"Oh really?" Mike scoffed.

'Pity I don't have any more brothers to prove my point, but I'd suppose a self change will do. Plus it will give Penelope more motivation. Tell her i said hi..." the cloaked woman said, waving her hand. Mike blinked, as he thought he saw sparks. "What did you do to me?" he demaned.

"Beginning to believe I've actually got magic?" she laughed. "Well....
1311111122.title: The cloaked woman is back

13111111221.content:
"the full moon will be up within the hour. The next three nights will be interesting"

Mike smiled. "Nice try. So you stalk me and my sisters." He hated werewolves and not many girls his age were into that, he couldn't escape from the inane talk of younger girls like me. He stared at the cloaked woman, and swore, despite unable to see her face, that she yawned. "Werewolves? bor-ring." No, you're a..."
13111111221.title: A were problem

choices: It was my ex, who crashed the sleepover
131111112211.content:
"werecat girl"

"What?"

"You heard me. You're a female werecat. Say hi to Penny and Jessica for me?" the woman said, as she vanished, much to Mike stunned disbelief. He said to himself, "How did she do that? Is she serious? And why did she stress Jessica?"

Meanwhile I looked at Jess who looked increasingly uncomfortable, not that i blamed her. While it seemed everyone thought she always was my sister, Jess, she looked around panicked that someone would discover thay wasn't the case. I guess taking a guy turned girl to a sleepover wasn't the best way to make her relax. Especially when the subject turned to boys.

"so how do you like?" Erin asked Jess.

"What? Nobody...." Jess stammered. as she blushed. She was spared further embrassment as someone knocked loudly on the door.
131111112211.title: Two transformations

1311111122111.content:
"What are you do here?" I demanded as I saw the unwelcome sight of my ex. Josh was a jerk, dumping me as soon as he heard he wasn't going to be a cheerleaders' boyfriend Seeing him trying to crash the sleepover, I felt enraged.

"Hi Penny. Can we talk?" Josh asked, looking in. It did not improve my mood, as he was clearly checking us out, especially Jess, who knew she was being checked out..

"You jerk! Why are you checking us out?"

"Penny. Just because you're in your pajamas...."

"You just want me for my looks" I snarled. "First the cheeleader, and now this..."

"Calm down" Josh said, holding his hands up. "You don't know how hard it is to be me"

What? He serious? That's the worst line I've ever heard. All he cares about is himself "Hard to be you!?! What the fuck does that have to do with you? Forget it. I wish it is hard for you to be you too! Get out of my sight" I yelled, as I slammed the door in his face.

"Thanks for getting rid of the trash" Mandy grinned. "don't know why you dated him."

"My fault" Erin groaned. "I thought her was a good guy, but he just wants to see that skirt. Probably the 'hard' thing about him is telling his friends after all the bragging that he's dating a cheerleader.

"Yeah. You don't need it' Carrie added, as she glanced at the only cheerleader in the room. Erin brushed it off. Meanwhile Jess looked troubled and withdrawn. As soon as i could, i whispered :What's wrong?"

"what if you accidently put a spell on that jerk? You can't look after him and me" little did i know i would be looking after Josh, Jess and Mike.
1311111122111.title: It was my ex, who crashed the sleepover

13111111221111.content:
"I'll win her back." muttered Josh, walking away from the small house. "I just need find the right opening."

"What you need is a lesson... young lady." came a female voice, giggling.

Josh spun around, only to see the hall around him shrinking. "What the-" he did not have a chance to finish speaking as he felt a sharp pain in his gut, forcing him to scream. Only the scream that came out was high pitched, much like that of a little girl as his over sized clothing shifted and shrank into a pair of pink panties and a matching pink dress with white stockings and black mary janes. "What happened!?" he, or rather, she asked, seeing her new look.

"I'm teaching you what its like to be a girl." said a cloaked woman in the hall with her. "The best way to learn is at the beginning, be thankful I made you a child and not an infant."

"Change me back, you bitch!" furious, Josh yelled. "I'll... I'll..."

"You'll never change back with language like that, little girl." taunted the cloaked woman. "The spell keeping you that way will reverse when and only when you can learn to act like a proper little girl." she giggled. "Until then, you can be Penny's little cousin, Josie."

"No!" screamed Josie, crying. "Change me back!"

The woman only laughed before vanishing as the front door opened and I sighed, seeing who I, due to the spell, believed was my little cousin, Josie. "What are you doing here, kiddo?" I asked, walking up to her. "Did you run off because your dad and mom have a fight again?" Josie remained quiet, sobbing and I shook my head. "Come on, Josie, I better watch after you until things cool down at your house."

With that, I picked up Josie, unaware he was my ex-boyfriend, and carried her into the house...
13111111221111.title: continue

131111112211112.content:
Mike stared out of the window, watching the sun set. Even though what that weird cloaked woman said was impossible, it badly unnerved him. He gave a slight sigh as the sun set. Get a grip Mike he scolded himself. Werecats and nekos only exist in those animes He wondered if he should call the police, tell them that there is a lunatic with a Jedi complex running around town. That thought brought a slight smile to his face, as he thought of the other place nekos are found; those comic con events. His smile quickly turned into a frown as a slight pain ripped through his gut.

What's happening to me? Mike thought, wondering if something he ate disagreed with him. He stood up, only for him to double over again. As he recoiled he felt his chest itch. As he slowly stood up, he realize what happened. "Arrrghhh. My chest... The... they're breast!" he screamed, seeing two lumps jutting out of his chest "That woman...." Frightened, he moved his hand from his breast, to his crotch, and realized that 'he' was the wrong desciption. Mike screamed even more as she realized she had turned into a woman.

"H how?" she stammered, as she slumped to the floor. Trying to calm herself, she started to say her thoughts aloud "That woman.... She said to say hi to Penny and Jessica... Did she change them both into girls? Oh my god... What if she did? I've thought of them as being my sisters... What if people think I've always been a woman... What if the guys see me... What would happen if I start acting like a girl... " Uncomfortable with that line of thoughts, he started to think more of the cloaked woman. "Shit.. She said catgirl..." Mike leapt up, just as she felt a tail burst out of her ill-fitting jeans. She looked at her hands, and saw orange fur begin to sprout out of her skin. "I... I got fur..." she said as she fainted.
131111112211112.title: At home, a Neko situation.

choices: as a teenager at the slumber party.
as a young woman in front of Mike.
1311111122111121.content:
Unknown to me, the cloaked woman froze outside of my house as she found herself confronted by a tall and slender elderly woman with salt and pepper hair wearing a long black dress. "That is quite enough, Lola Jinx." Hissing, the woman said. "Did you seriously think I would not find out about your forced transformations around this family?"

"I do not bow to your law, Elvira Strange!" Defiant, Lola snapped. "All who I have transformed, minus that poor excuse for a boyfriend have a great potential for magic."

"It is not your place or mine to decide for them." Sternly, Elvira countered. "That and no one is above the law; you will answer for your crimes."

Lola turned to run only to find four muscular women in police uniforms blocking her path. "This is not over, head witch!" Angry, she hissed.

With a cloud of black smoke, she was gone. Elvira sighed in frustration before turning to the four women. "Post a search for rogue witch Lola Jinx." Firmly, she commanded. "Also, arrange for a distant watch on this family."

"Should we clean up the rogue's mess, madam head witch?" Politely, one guard asked.

"Not just yet." Serious, Elvira said. "We do not know why Lola targeted this one family; there are others in the area who carry greater potential."

"What are your orders, madam head witch?" Politely, the second guard inquired.

"For now, we just watch and see how they deal with their situation." After a thought, Elvira replied. "We will move in only if there is a clear risk of them injuring themselves or others. Just make certain Lola does not make their situation any worse."

The four guards nodded before they and Elvira vanished from sight. Minutes later, a lone witch appeared....
1311111122111121.title: A rogue on the run.

13111111221111211.content:
At the slumber party, a young teenage girl entered the apartment suite as many of the party goers greeted her warmly. She smiled politely at them and walked straight to you. The girl had long honey blond hair and green eyes and was wearing a school uniform you did not recognize. "My name is Hayley Harrison." Whispering, she said. "We need to talk in private."

Before you could utter a word in protest, Hayley dragged you into an empty room and closed the door. You sensed magic being used before she turned to you. "There is little time so let us not play games." Serious, Hayley said. "I am a witch, granddaughter to the head witch, I was asked to help you with your magic problem."

"Do witches make it a habit to disrupt the lives of other people?" Ice in your voice, you demanded. "Also, how do you intend to help me? The last witch said something similar and look at the mess we are in."

"That was a criminal or rogue witch who attacked your family." Patiently, Hayley replied. "I understand your anger and frustration. I am here to help you clean up the mess."

You sighed, though feeling very shaken. "I appreciate the help." More calmly, you said. "What can you do to help us?"

"First, you need to understand that we witches are a very secretive group." Calmly, Hayley explained. "Do not use your magic in public and tell no one of your powers unless you know for certain you can trust them."

You nodded at that. "Granted but doesn't answer my question."

"I am helping you now, Penny." Remaining calm, Hayley said. "Believe me, there are worse things magic can do to a boy than swap your gender."

That made you fearful and uncomfortable. "Where do we start?" Timidly, you asked.

Hayley gave a faint smile. "We start by..."
13111111221111211.title: You gain an ally.

131111112211112111.content:
"How does relaxing help anything?" Confused, you asked.

"Strong emotions augment magic." Simply, Hayley replied. "As a girl, your temporary sister has magic too." She sighed. "With no training, getting too upset could cause your magic or her magic to react and anything could happen."

You sighed, doing your best to relax. "It's not easy under the circumstances..."

I know." Patiently, Hayley said. "Still, it is an important part of cleaning up this mess... my brother went through a similar experience with his best friend."

"How did they beat it?" Wincing, I asked.

"Through resistance to magic, much like your new sister will, given time." Serious, Hayley said. "However, we need to bring Jake back sooner than the required three weeks time."

"How do I do it then?" Curious, I asked.

"I will help you... after the slumber party." Calmly, Hayley said. "Try to remember, we do not want to raise too many suspicions."

"I just hope Jessica has the patience..." Worried, I said.

"She will survive a few nights as one of the girls." Bemused, Hayley said. "So will your older sister, Michelle."

That startled you. "What...?!"

Hayley hushed you silent. "My grandmother has already cast an unaware spell on her." Quietly, she explained. "She will return to being Mike once I walk you through how to change her and Jessica back to normal."

"Okay..." Irritated, you said. "Just no more surprises, okay?"

info.brief_description: A teenage girl discovers that magic exists
info.description:
My name is Penny Jeffers, and I'm 15. I live with my two brothers Jake and Mike. Little do I know my life is going take a different course when I find a strange woman in my bedroom, claiming I have magic powers

Rules.
Witches must be female. If a witch becomes a guy, she loses her powers
In Penny's universe, any type of magic is allowed. Just remember that Penny is just learning about her powers
